channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- HUAWEI Mate 20 Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- HUAWEI Mate 20 Pro

item.title: CVE-2020-1786|2024-08-04T06:46:30.952Z -- huawei -- huawei%20mate%2020%20pro
item.description: HUAWEI Mate 20 Pro smartphones versions earlier than 10.0.0.175(C00E69R3P8) have an improper authentication vulnerability. The software does not sufficiently validate the name of apk file in a special condition which could allow an attacker to forge a crafted application as a normal one. Successful exploit could allow the attacker to bypass digital balance function.
